title: Failed to detect with custom trained model along with coco
body:
Hi, first let me thank you for all the work you put in this repo, it's amazing.

What I'm trying to do is to train a custom model with some of my own pics & labels, and some of the COCO pics & labels.

My own data set is made from screenshots of a video camera. I labeled persons and hats with Labelbox, like this:
![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13971749/72119593-eabfce00-338f-11ea-9eea-4ab239f17f5b.jpg)

After then I extracted the cell phone pics and labels from COCO and combined them with my own pics & labels together. I tried to train them with darknet53.conv.74 with default settings, but it raises a warning saying "non-finite loss, ending training tensor". So I did a bit research and lowered giou to 1 and lr0 to 0.00001. The model was trained all good, but it failed to detect cell phones in my tests (I tried yolov3.weights, and it has no trouble with it), also the person & hat detection was not satisfying as before (when I trained person & hat with darknet53.conv.74).

Detection from person & hat model I trained with darknet53.conv.74, it was good:
![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13971749/72120225-38d5d100-3392-11ea-9830-04653b48f450.jpg)

Detection from yolov3.weights that only displays labels of cell phone, it was good:
![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13971749/72120300-7a667c00-3392-11ea-87af-fe358721879b.jpg)

Detection from person & hat, combined with cell phone class in COCO, trained with darknet53.conv.74 and giou set to 1 and lr0 set to 0.00001, it was bad:
![4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13971749/72120549-463f8b00-3393-11ea-83fa-acdf67983811.jpg)

Wonder what I should do now.
